objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Action/Adventure lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about food and dining out using slang register
Students create original action themed content about food and dining out in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using slang register in action context
Character B: Responding in slang register within action theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with chase
food and dining out with pursuit
food and dining out with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
